page.title: 05ROAD TRANSPORT
page.content:
We did a{traffic census}at{Cudworth railway bridge where the road from Monk Bretton joins the{A628}from Barnsley which goes through Cudworth and Shafton and on to{Pontefract; because it is a main road there is a great variety of road users.
TRAFFIC CENSUS: 1 July 1985: 0930-1030
Pedal cycles................. 4 Motor cycles................. 13 Cars.........................781 Commercial vehicles(HGV).....174 Commercial vehicles(light)... 85 Buses (Public service)....... 33 Buses (Private).............. 69
